title: Late Mr. Rajamahendran posthumously awarded Brazilian “Order of Rio Branco Award”
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Brazilian “Order of Rio Branco Award” was conferred posthumously on late Mr. R. Rajamahendran, the Former Chairman of the Capital Maharaja Group, last evening (24).
The Order of Rio Branco is awarded to recognize and celebrate the merits of Brazilian and foreign individuals who have significantly contributed to the promotion of Brazil’s relation with the world.
The Chairman of the Capital Maharaja Group Mr. Sashi Rajamahendran accepted the award.
Former banker and renowned businessman Mr. Jayantha Perera was also awarded the accolade at the same event.
